channel.title: How to change a .dat file to file required for metsaquio?
channel.description:
ok so im running a 317 and when i try and add comp cape it is huge!! so i need to put it on metasequia to resize it but when i try and add the .dat file it wont let me what type of file is required and how?? please
thanks for reading!

item.title: How to change a .dat file to file required for metsaquio?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

In the future, remember to look at what section you’re posting in before posting. That way it’s more likely you’ll get the help you need.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change a .dat file to file required for metsaquio?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Load the dat file into the dat maker program, then file > export as mqo

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a .dat file to file required for metsaquio?

item.title: How to change a .dat file to file required for metsaquio?
item.dc:creator: @sbain9395 sbain9395
item.description:
@sbain9395 wrote:

ohokay:

You will need a program called dat maker or dat viewer. This converts the file from dat to mqo/mqo v2 and vice versa

thank you very much!
i got datmaker do you have any idea on how to transfer it?

Read full topic
